Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Ares/Demon Wulf/Flesh 
Ripper/Dark Claw/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:




"I shall indeed be careful." Vehement replied, motioning to Sun Crusher and 
Reflector, the three bots entering the Brotherhood base, the main access 
hatch sealing itself as they went inside.

---

Dark One nodded at Zardus' order, taking out his plasma rifle, giving the 
Oblitercons a look.

Breakdown smiled as he took out his grenade launcher, watching Pyro take out 
his flame cannon, Hiss his fusion cannon, and Scavenger his automatic rifle.

---

Bumblebee, Injector, and Manterror blasted off into the air.

(I recently learned Manterror could fly.  I've owned him for so long, and I 
only now noticed his profile said he had wings...)

---

Double Punch cloaked, getting into a position near FZ.

---

Demon Wulf and his two brethren readied their weapons.

---

Sixshot transformed to his space fighter mode as Ares transformed into his 
tank mode.
